p: The Rubiaceae family contains about 13,500 species and 611 genera. It consists of terrestrial trees, shrubs, lianas, and herbs. Rubiaceae has a cosmopolitan distribution. However, the largest species diversity is concentrated in the tropics and subtropics [ 16]. Geophila is a small genus of the Rubiaceae family, containing about 30 species. It is found primarily in Asia-Tropical and Africa.
